ja458:12.1: ca vaṇṇo ca → āyuñca vaṇṇañca (bj, pts1)
ja458:13.3: Hāyateva tava → hāyate vata te (bj, s2, s3, mr) | hāyateva tato (pts1)
ja458:15.4: Kathaṃ nu devāna → kathaṃ na devānaṃ (pts1)
ja458:20.2: saṅgarattā idhāgato → saṅgaratthā idhāgato (bj, pts1) | saṅkaratthāyidhāgato (s2, s3)
ja458:23.3: jahati → jahāti (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | jahātī (?)
ja458:24.2: Bhariyā yāpi dhanena hoti kītā → bhariyā sāmiko sadhanena hoti (s2, s3) | bhariyāpi dhanena honti atittā (mr)
ja458:25.1: parabhojananti ñatvā → kāyo parabhojananti viditvā (s2, s3) | kāyo ca parabhojanaṃ viditvā (mr)
ja458:25.2: sugatiñca duggatiñca → sugatī ca duggatī ca (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | suggatiṃ duggatiñca (mr)
